DOC.brief_summary: This study 6-month intervention examine different dietary approached may useful woman Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome ( PCOS ) attempt pregnancy , particularly measure change weight . Participants randomly assign follow one two dietary approach weight loss : 1 ) low-calorie approach weight loss ( reduce caloric intake approximately 500 calorie per day ) 2 ) low-fat , low-glycemic index vegan diet . A vegan diet one contain animal product ( meat , fish , poultry , egg , dairy ) emphasize plant-based food , fruit , vegetable , whole grain , legumes/beans . In addition , diet low-glycemic index , mean consumer ask favor food n't cause quick rise blood sugar ( example , favor oatmeal cornflakes breakfast ) . Participants receive counsel support material dietary approach participant assign follow . Both diet safe show effective way assist achieve healthy weight . The investigator hypothesize group see improvement weight fertility possible great improvement see among participant vegan group .
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve two group . You randomly assign one group ( i.e . choice group assignment ) mean group assign chance . Both group receive information dietary approach aim losing weight . One group receive instruction low-calorie approach weight loss ( reduce caloric intake approximately 500 calorie per day ) . The group instruct follow low-fat , low-glycemic index vegan diet . A vegan diet one contain animal product ( meat , fish , poultry , egg , dairy ) emphasize plant-based food , fruit , vegetable , whole grain , legumes/beans . In addition , low-glycemic index diet , mean ask favor food n't cause quick rise blood sugar ( example , choose oatmeal cornflakes breakfast ) . Below step study : If accept study , come study site ( Fertility Center Carolinas Greenville ) learn study complete consent form . If live outside Columbia , SC area ( 60 mile drive ) , may complete study orientation process phone Web . You mail consent form sign return study coordinator . This study involve 3-4 in-person visit Fertility Center Carolinas office , last approximately 1.5 2 hour . You complete questionnaire measure diet physical activity level computer home location computer/internet access . You come back meet weight measure . You randomly assign one two group : calorie control group vegan diet group . You receive one-hour overview diet assign provided material diet . During study , ask complete weekly questionnaire ass follow diet , weight , ask information menstrual cycle . This take approximately 5 minute complete . You provide individualize feedback week via e-mail progress , along weekly lesson topic week . You access group website ( private Facebook group ) provide group support . Participation use group optional . You provide test strip monitor ovulation month pregnancy test ( 1 per month ) monitor pregnancy status . You report result u via online survey . Study personnel host weekly 30 minute webinar diet group online . This take place work time weekday . Make-up session phone work day available . At 3 month , ask complete another set questionnaires home return study site weight measurement . You continue study next 3 month . At study completion ( 6 month ) , complete last set questionnaire ( online ) . Also , come follow-up assessment weigh receive incentive participating ( $ 10 + $ 5/month menstrual cycle data submit total $ 25 possible ) . Participants group ask take daily prenatal vitamin ( reliable source vitamin B-12 ) course study . During study , ask keep physical activity level constant ( keep level study entry ) .
DOC.criteria: Women must meet following criterion : attempt pregnancy least 6 month currently pregnant clinical diagnosis PCOS oral medication insulin resistance ( metformin ) , currently medication , medication stable dose least 3 month willing use fertilityenhancing medication 6month study ( exception oral medication , clomiphene citrate , direct physician ) willing randomize either dietary condition able make weekly meeting . Participants study meet follow criterion : diagnosis polycystic ovarian syndrome try conceive less 6 month Body Mass Index less 25 great 45 kg/m2 currently pregnant young 18 old 35 year age smoker unable come Columbia , SC area least 34 time 6 month time period assessments n't access Internet computer n't access scale selfmonitoring weight n't willing randomize either group psychiatric disease , drug alcohol dependency , uncontrolled thyroid condition major health condition , heart condition , diabetes , past incidence stroke unable receive consent doctor participate currently blood pressure medication , issue dizziness , bone joint issue eat disorder currently participate weight loss program take weight loss medication
